thread.title: Lovely quirky hotel. Great location.
thread.title_full: Lovely quirky hotel. Great location. - Review of Ibis Styles London Southwark Rose, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: stug97
title: Lovely quirky hotel. Great location.
text:
Loved our one night stay here. Great quite differently decorated and furnished hotel. Location good, Southwark Bridge Road is relatively quiet, but still easily accessible. (TUBE London Bridge 10mins walk, excellent bus RV1 2 mins away). Easy to walk to South Bank, Waterloo, Borough Market, London Bridge, shard etc.
Rooms quite small, but perfectly adequate and well furnished. Seemingly quite a new or recently refurbished hotel. Nice basic continental breakfast included in price. There is a car park, but charges eye watering.
Well recommend this hotel, great location. Very close to all of central London, but just far enough out to be a tad quieter.
Room Tip: Quieter on car park side. We had Road side and still didn't hear a thing all night!. See more room tips
